Posts.EditableText:
When I'm trying to uploading my game this error comes. No idea what it means, no meaningful messages provided. Does anyone know why it can happen? I can provide code if needed.

P.S. Uploading even a simple game (default created) gives me an error :( 

**UPD:** Well, actually I have updated some existing game with my file, it turned out to be working. Still it's a bug and should be fixed
Posts.HTML:
When I'm trying to uploading my game this error comes. No idea what it means, no meaningful messages provided. Does anyone know why it can happen? I can provide code if needed.

P.S. Uploading even a simple game (default created) gives me an error :(
